description:
Our main character Shigeno Daigo is a 2nd year student in middle school, whose father is a pro baseball player who went as far as playing in the Major League. Daigo goes to Fuurin Academy with his childhood friend Sakura Mutsuko, who was also his teammate on the little league baseball team. While both of them are on the baseball team, they only have 6 members in total, of which 4 are girls. Just then, at the admission ceremony, a bunch of 1st years with sports scholarships gathered and...
Source: crunchyroll
